# File lib/grit/commit.rb, line 152
    def self.diff(repo, a, b = nil, paths = [])
      if b.is_a?(Array)
        paths = b
        b     = nil
      end
      paths.unshift("--") unless paths.empty?
      paths.unshift(b)    unless b.nil?
      paths.unshift(a)
      text = repo.git.diff({:full_index => true}, *paths)
      Diff.list_from_string(repo, text)
    end
